title: Reciprocity
context: [ยง431:8-322] Reciprocity. (a) The commissioner shall waive any requirements for a nonresident surplus lines broker license applicant with a valid license from the applicant&rsquo;s home state, except for the requirements imposed by section 431:8-321, if the applicant&rsquo;s home state awards nonresident surplus lines broker licenses to residents of this State on the same basis. (b) A nonresident surplus lines broker&rsquo;s satisfaction of the surplus lines broker&rsquo;s home state&rsquo;s continuing education requirements for licensed surplus lines brokers shall constitute satisfaction of this State&rsquo;s continuing education requirements if the nonresident surplus lines broker&rsquo;s home state recognizes the satisfaction of its continuing education requirements imposed upon surplus lines brokers from this State on the same basis. [L 2012, c 66, pt of ยง1]
